params.snapshotHash: keccak256 hash of the snapshot content (timestamp + risk + assessment)

params.newOwner: The address of the new owner

count().notice: Returns the total number of recorded health snapshots.

latest().notice: Returns the most recent health record, or reverts if none exist.

recordHealth(bytes32,string).notice: Record a new protocol health snapshot on-chain.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfer ownership to a new address. Set to address(0) to renounce.
